---
title: "Edit model inventory fields"
date: last-modified
---

Edit individual detail fields on a model to ensure that model details are accurate and up-to-date.

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model is already registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] You are the model owner for the model you would like edit the details of, a `Customer Admin`, or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^2]

:::

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**. 

2. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.[^3]

3. Hover over a field until the **{{< fa pencil >}}** appears, then click to make your changes:  

   - Click **Save** to apply your changes.
   - Click **Cancel** to discard your changes.
